definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: As it is I have been forced into becoming a sort of pamphleteer.
sentences.chinese: 事實是，我被迫成了一名寫小冊子的作家。

sentences.english: The pamphlet suggests getting off the bus or train one stop early.
sentences.chinese: 小冊子建議，我們應該提前一站下汽車或者地鐵。

sentences.english: The new booklet is also a renewed effort to preserve WMO history for future generations.
sentences.chinese: 這個新的小冊子也在努力將WMO的歷史留存於後世。

sentences.english: I need a brochure for a water-engineering firm based in Nairobi, Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 我需要在內羅畢，肯尼亞的節水型工程公司的小冊子。

sentences.english: Design and production of brochures, booklets , name cards etc.
sentences.chinese: 各種出版物的設計及印務，如小冊子，手冊，名片等。

sentences.english: I sit down along a brooklet with a booklet in hand.
sentences.chinese: 我手捧一本小冊子，坐在一條小河旁。

sentences.english: A compact brochure which explains all the Tego additives resins in table form.
sentences.chinese: 一本以表格形式簡單介紹所有迪高產品的小冊子。

sentences.english: They distributed political pamphlets in the hall.
sentences.chinese: 他們在大廳裏散發政治小冊子。

sentences.english: By this morning's post I have received a pamphlet dealing with conditions in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上的郵件裏我收到一個關於德國情況的小冊子。

sentences.english: He often pamphleteers and lectures in favour of free trade.
sentences.chinese: 他經常講演及寫小冊子支持自由貿易。

sentences.english: Their pamphlets and magazines enjoyed a very small circulation.
sentences.chinese: 他們所出的小冊子和刊物發行數非常少。

sentences.english: The map folds up into a booklet.
I have a brochure that lists the Rockettes' performances.
sentences.chinese: 我有一本小冊子，列出了羅凱特氏的演出。

sentences.english: The pamphlet contained brief characterizations of famous Vermonters.
sentences.chinese: 這本小冊子對著名的佛蒙特人進行了簡要描述。

sentences.english: Enjoy a taste of what's in store through our image-rich online brochure.
sentences.chinese: 通過圖文並茂在線小冊子您來享受我店中美味。

definition: to thumb through/to flip through (a book)
